documentation.text:
@notice Buys NFTs with ETH and sells them for tokens in one transaction
@param params All the parameters for the swap (packed in struct to avoid stack too deep), containing:
- ethToNFTSwapList The list of NFTs to buy
- nftToTokenSwapList The list of NFTs to sell
- inputAmount The max amount of tokens to send (if ERC20)
- tokenRecipient The address that receives tokens from the NFTs sold
- nftRecipient The address that receives NFTs
- deadline UNIX timestamp deadline for the swap

@notice Buys NFTs with ERC20, and sells them for tokens in one transaction
@param params All the parameters for the swap (packed in struct to avoid stack too deep), containing:
- ethToNFTSwapList The list of NFTs to buy
- nftToTokenSwapList The list of NFTs to sell
- inputAmount The max amount of tokens to send (if ERC20)
- tokenRecipient The address that receives tokens from the NFTs sold
- nftRecipient The address that receives NFTs
- deadline UNIX timestamp deadline for the swap
@param deadline The last valid time for a swap

@notice Buys NFTs with ETH and sells them for tokens in one transaction
@param params All the parameters for the swap (packed in struct to avoid stack too deep), containing:
- ethToNFTSwapList The list of NFTs to buy
- nftToTokenSwapList The list of NFTs to sell
- inputAmount The max amount of tokens to send (if ERC20)
- tokenRecipient The address that receives tokens from the NFTs sold
- nftRecipient The address that receives NFTs
- deadline UNIX timestamp deadline for the swap

@notice Buys NFTs with ERC20, and sells them for tokens in one transaction
@param params All the parameters for the swap (packed in struct to avoid stack too deep), containing:
- ethToNFTSwapList The list of NFTs to buy
- nftToTokenSwapList The list of NFTs to sell
- inputAmount The max amount of tokens to send (if ERC20)
- tokenRecipient The address that receives tokens from the NFTs sold

- deadline UNIX timestamp deadline for the swap
@param deadline The last valid time for a swap

pairTransferERC20From(address,address,ad.details: Allows an ERC20 pair contract to transfer ERC20 tokens directly from the sender, in order to minimize the number of token transfers. Only callable by an ERC20 pair.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to transfer
params.from: The address to transfer tokens from
params.to: The address to transfer tokens to
params.variant: The pair variant of the pair contract

pairTransferNFTFrom(address,address,addr.details: Allows a pair contract to transfer ERC721 NFTs directly from the sender, in order to minimize the number of token transfers. Only callable by a pair.

params.from: The address to transfer tokens from
params.id: The ID of the NFT to transfer
params.to: The address to transfer tokens to
params.variant: The pair variant of the pair contract

params.deadline: The Unix timestamp (in seconds) at/after which the swap will revert
params.inputAmount: The amount of ERC20 tokens to add to the ERC20-to-NFT swaps
params.nftRecipient: The address that will receive the NFT output
params.swapList: The list of pairs to trade with and the number of NFTs to buy from each.

params.deadline: The Unix timestamp (in seconds) at/after which the swap will revert
params.inputAmount: The amount of ERC20 tokens to add to the ERC20-to-NFT swaps
params.nftRecipient: The address that will receive the NFT output
params.swapList: The list of pairs to trade with and the IDs of the NFTs to buy from each.
